SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_DIG_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_DIG_000_CUT_000_000.text:
There looks to be something in
this spot. We should dig here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_DIG_000_CUT_010_030.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_DIG_000_CUT_010_030.text:
It can do something with
all the sand!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_DIG06_SUCCESS_AIRSHIP_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_DIG06_SUCCESS_AIRSHIP_.text:
It's a device to control
the sand's energy.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_DIG04_SUCCESS_WARSHIP_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_DIG04_SUCCESS_WARSHIP_.text:
It's a device to prevent
the sand from separating.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_DIG00_SUCCESS_DIVING_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_DIG00_SUCCESS_DIVING_0.text:
It's a device to prevent
the sand from clustering.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_DIG02_SUCCESS_FERRY_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_DIG02_SUCCESS_FERRY_00.text:
It's a device to adjust the
sand's shifting ability.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_DIG_MISS_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_DIG_MISS_000_CUT_000_0.text:
We should take this with us;
seems proper useful, it does.

SUB_W13_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W13_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Sand is flooding in from everywhere!
Terribly unpleasant thing, that.
How are you holding up?

SUB_W13_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
I have my anti-sand systems set to high,
so my body is good as anything—but all
the sand is causing heaps of interference
in my sensors. This sand has wee bits of metal in it,
which seems to be the source of the problem.
Do ye have any information on this world
ye can share with me, then?

SUB_W13_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W13_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
It's called the Crowrealm, and it's
full of sand. My wisdom ends there.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
These are the remnants of a giant warship.
Judging by the advanced state of decay,
it must be quite old.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh, and there's a scarecrow! I don't
see any birds for it to frighten away,
but the fact it's there suggests there
are people living nearby.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I haven't seen anyone out this way in days.
Where exactly did you come from, anyway?
The airship? The cruise ship? The submarine?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
What a high-spec scarecrow you must be
to engage in all this chatter! Well, my serial number is D05-72314,
and I'm commonly known as Songstress
Diva No. 5. I'm here looking for my heart
if ye happen to know anything about that.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Oh, you know my name! How wonderful. So yes, I'm Scarecrow. But as for why I'm a scarecrow, I have no idea! Also, I don't know if I have a heart or not. But the humans might, so why not head over to the airship?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
So sorry, but I don't have any data
on this world. Might ye be a love
and show me the way?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh, I'd be delighted! I'm bored to tears
with all this standing around. Follow me!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
And there you are!
One airship, just as promised.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Aye, but how do we get there?
The sand is just going to push us back.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Oh, right! In that case,
I know where we should go.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Oh my days, it's a massive mech!
Seems to be switched on, but it's not
moving or otherwise doing anything.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Hello, Spookcrow. I'd like you to change
the flow of the sand, if you would.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Spookcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
HEY THERE, SCARECROW! WHAT ARE YOU
WANDERING AROUND AIMLESSLY FOR?
IS IT THIS LADY'S FAULT!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Can ye change the flow
of the sand, love?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Spookcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
ME? NAH! I CAN'T DO SQUAT, BUDDY!
BUT THE ROBOT CAN!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Does the excessive volume of your
voice serve any particular purpose?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Spookcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
SORRY ABOUT THAT! THIS IS JUST THE NATURAL
VOLUME FOR ME! NOW HANG ON AND I'LL GET
THAT SAND CHANGED FOR YOU, BUDDY!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text: We should be able to proceed now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
This is what remains of an airship.
I'm getting multiple biological readings
from inside, so clearly people live here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Oh sure! Lots of 'em!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
There appears to be no sand inside,
which makes it an ideal living space.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I say, who are you!?
Did you come from the outside!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I'm D05-72314, also known as Songstress
Diva No. 5, and I've come here searching
for my heart. I take it you don't get many
visitors from the outside, then?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
We most certainly do not! Hmm... But since
you are clearly standing here now, it could
mean the legend of Pandora is real! You must tell me everything
you know about Pandora!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Ach! Please calm down!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: That's right! Let's all take it easy.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Shut up, strawman! ...AHEM! Yes, well,
I suppose it's possible I got a smidge
excited there. Apologies.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I'm the Professor, and I'm researching the history
of the Crowrealm. Though a desert now, this land
once had something called an 'ocean,' and this
very airship once soared through the skies.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Alas, now the world is nothing but sand,
and the airships lie in pieces on the ground.
And what is the cause of this misery, you ask?
The answer to that...is said to be Pandora!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Are ye referring to Pandora's Box,
the vessel said to have been filled
with calamities beyond counting? I was under the impression its existence
was a load of rubbish, but perhaps it
truly can be found in this world.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Legends claim the one who opened the box was a person from the outside—and it goes on to say that the one to close the box will be another person from the outside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh, how I hope the legend is a lie. For if true,
it means our world is held sway by the whims
of outsiders! And in that case, what are the
rest of us even worth?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Right? What's my worth?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
So where is this Pandora, then? If all
that needs doing is to close some wee
box, I should be able to get that sorted.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
It's just a legend, my dear. Nothing more.
Do you truly intend to follow it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I was under the impression ye all want
Pandora to be closed. I'd like to help
with this if I can, for perhaps it will
lead to my own heart.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: I don't know if I should call you an oddity or a nosy parker... Are all people from the outside like you? Er, anyway. Be that all as it may, I sadly have no idea where Pandora is. You'll just have to find it yourself.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oooh, oooh! I know where it is!
It could be here. Or there.
Or way out there someplace.
Could be anywhere, really!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Let me leave you with this warning:
Do not make friends with the scarecrows.
They're all irresponsible oafs to the last,
just like this straw-headed ninny here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I thought your people were the
ones who made the scarecrows?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Perish the thought! If I had to guess,
I imagine they came from Pandora itself.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Another giant mech!
I wonder if Pandora is inside it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, it's but a den of fiends inside!
You're better off staying here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Yeah, probably no point to it.
Also, hey, Sorrowcrow. Been a while.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
There are fiends in this world, then.
Did they also emerge from Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Woe, but those things have always been here!
Honestly, I've no idea if they're older
than Pandora or not.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: Are the scarecrows older than Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: Well, let's have a peek inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
We'll have to see if we can
find Pandora somewhere else.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, what misery! However, I can
at least change the flow of sand now
that those horrid fiends are gone.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: I'll count on ye for that, love.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
It's a combat robot.
Could this be Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Hello there, love.
Is this Pandora, then?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
I fear everything good Strangecrow here says
always means both 'yes' and 'no.' My advice is
to just interpret his answers however you like.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.text: Oh dear. I'm rubbish at riddles.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
I wonder if this mech can change
the flow of the sand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Still, wouldn't it make sense to establish such
things near to the dunes themselves? Why are
they so far away? Also, how are they even able
to manipulate the dunes to begin with?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Are they capable of doing anything
besides changing the direction
of the sands, then?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Why is there always a scarecrow
next to each of them?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
I wonder if this mech can change
the flow of the sand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Sand? Awww, that's easy! ♥
Also, heya, baby! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: Hi, Sweetcrow! Nice to see you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
You just ask for whatever you want, boo. ♥
There's nothing a scarecrow can't do! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Oh, that's brilliant! Can you tell me
about my missing heart, then!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Hearts live in the ♥s of all scarecrows...
and you're totally welcome to take
my ♥ home, lover girl! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: I'm sorry, I cannae do that.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Don't think I know you, friend.
Are you another junker?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I'm D05-72314, also known as Songstress
Diva No. 5. I'm looking for my heart.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Well now, that's some unusual treasure
you're out for. I mostly look for gears and
engine parts and showerheads and... Well,
you know. Things people want.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
This place is a veritable mountain of treasure,
but because of that, I have a bunch of scoundrels
in here bugging me. ...See?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
They've been fighting a war ever since
Pandora opened up—even though the
world's like it is and no one has any
clue what the war is for anymore. Hell, I don't even know if we're supposed
to destroy this place or protect it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
This is a submarine:
protector of the ocean.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I'm here to close Pandora. Once I do,
their war can finally come to an end.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: And why would you do that? I don't see what you're getting out of all this, friend.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
My heart, hopefully. I don't have any
hard data to suggest this will lead me
to it, but I want to believe it will.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
See, you get it! It's the not-knowing that
makes it a real treasure hunt; can't search
for something if you know it's guaranteed.
Anyway, good luck to you, friend.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
This is the only place we haven't
looked yet. I calculate a 96 percent
chance Pandora will be found here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: It's here!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Are you people nuts? What are you doing
here? The robots will tear you to shreds
if they find you! Okay, let's back up. I'm the Engineer,
and I'm looking for a way to turn
the tide of this war in our favor.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I am D05-72314, also known as Songstress
Diva No. 5. I'm here searching for my heart,
and also for Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Pandora, eh? Yes, I've heard the rumors:
Close the box and poof! The war is over.
Honestly, I have doubts that something
so convenient actually exists.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Still, war robots continue to be produced
in this place, as you've no doubt seen.
So if Pandora is anywhere, it's likely here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Let's have a look around, then.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm coming with you. We might get to meet
whoever opened Pandora to start with—though
if they went in as a human and are still alive,
no doubt they're some kind of monster now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Then let's go hunt a monster!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
There are countless robot-production
lines here, but none are active.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: No, listen. Something is still operational around here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Hey, look! Monsters over that way.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
This line is active. I wonder if I
was made on a line just like this.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Sand. It's making sand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
You scarecrows are all the same:
liars to the last.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Nae, he's right! It's making sand-sized robots!
The countless tiny readings my sensors were
picking up were actually these robots!
That's what makes up all the sand here!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: ...Pretty sure it's just sand. But even if it was robots, what good would that do us?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
The fact the sand is robots means that it can
be controlled, which is how those mechs can
manipulate it from afar. Pandora's true identity
is a terminal capable of sending orders to sand!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Okay, let's say you're correct, and the robots
covered the world in sand to win the war.
The war is over now, but the sand remains.
So how are we supposed to remove it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
We close Pandora and stop
the production of the sand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Sand's coming. Oh, and it's taken the
form of a fiend, so look out for that!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I thought closing Pandora would be a task
I could handle, but it seems I was wrong.
Clearly, handling an infinite number of
fiends is a thing beyond me. Apologies.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, we won't solve this problem with
tired brains. How about I keep watch
for a bit while you rest?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Ho, friend! Find any treasure?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Nope!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, everything good is buried beneath
the sand, so all you need to find it is
a little luck...and a secret weapon.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
My little friend here can find all sorts
of things buried in the sand. Poor thing managed to survive the war,
but can't seem to put it behind him.
Hoping this little treasure hunt of yours
can help him move past it for good.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: I'm Diva. What's your name?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sarab
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Sarab.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Onward, my secret weapon!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
It seems Pandora's just some robot that
has nothing to do with your heart.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: I'll close Pandora anyway.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: I'm out.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text:
Did you figure out a way
to fight the sand yet?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text: Aye, and we're ready to try it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text:
It stopped... You did it!
You closed Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text:
Hey, looks like you found some
treasure. Good for you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text:
Fine work, my dear! Now it's our turn to
show our quality: we're going to turn the
Crowrealm into a world of sky and water
and green once more!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text:
We were able to close Pandora, but we didn't
learn anything about me heart. I'm guessing
it's not buried under the sand?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text:
Your heart's not that kind of thing, no.
Let's leave this world and look elsewhere.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text: I wonder where MY heart is.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text: Let's look for our hearts together.

SUB_W13_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W13_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_010_CUT_000_00.text:
This world is called the Crowrealm. The name
would suggest it's full of birds, but it's actually
full of sand. I wonder what happened to make
it that way.

SUB_W13_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_010_CUT_000_01.text:
It looks to be a special kind of sand, too:
my sensors are experiencing significant
interference and cannae work properly.
Oh dear, I'll never find my heart now...

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
This is what remains of an airship.
This world must have been home to an
advanced civilization at some point.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Still, I wonder why there's a scarecrow when
there's no sign of fields or crows about.
Who put it here, and for what purpose?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh my days! I wasn't expecting
a scarecrow to talk.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh, I'm a talker, all right!
Haven't seen a person out this
way in quite a few days, though. So where'd you come from?
Cruise ship? Battleship? Submarine?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I'm D05-72314, also known as Songstress
Diva No. 5. I came from a place called Avalon,
and I'm looking for my heart.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I don't know if I have a heart to begin with.
Heck, I don't even know why I'm a scarecrow!
Humans might know something though, so why
not wander over and check out the submarine?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
So sorry, but I don't have any data
on this world. Might ye be a love
and show me the way?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh, I'd be delighted! I'm bored to tears
with all this standing around. Follow me.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
And there you are!
One submarine, just as promised.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Aye, but how do we get there?
The sand is just going to push us back.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Oh, right! In that case,
I know where we should go.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Oh my days, it's a massive robot!
Seems to be switched on, but it's
not moving or otherwise doing anything.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Hello, Sweetcrow. I'd like you to change
the flow of the sand, if you would.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Scarecrow, baby! Good to see you! ♥
And sure, that's an easy ask. ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: Can ye change the flow of the sand?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Not me, hot stuff. But the robot can! ♥
Go on now, big guy! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: We should be able to proceed now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
This is what remains of a submarine.
I'm getting multiple biological readings
from inside, so clearly people live here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
The inside is cool as anything.
It's an ideal living environment.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Well, well! Not often we see outsiders
around these parts. Who might you be?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I'm D05-72314, also known as Songstress
Diva No. 5, and I'm looking for my heart.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Great. Another weirdo. Well, as you can see,
this world's a ruin because of a long war,
so it's not a place where you'll find hearts
or love or any of that positive nonsense.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Never mind. Just go ahead and sniff
around wherever you want for this
heart of yours. I hope you find it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Nae, I'm afraid I don't have the first
idea where to start looking. Do ye
have any suggestions for me, love?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Well, you'd need a pretty special place to
find a heart—and the only special place
I can think of in this dump is Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
As in the box said to have
unleashed countless calamities?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
And a scholar on top of everything.
If you know about Pandora, that means
it's likely infected your world as well.
No wonder you're searching for a heart.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Well, it can't be long now until this whole
world is devoured by Pandora, so I very
much hope you're able to locate it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: Where will I find Pandora, then?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: Oooh, but I know where it is! It could be here. Or there. Or way out that way someplace. Could be anywhere, really!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Wiser words were never spoken. Look,
just have Scarecrow take you where
you want to go; that's his job.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
It's a combat mech.
Could this be Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Hello there, love.
Is this Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.text: That's a no, I take it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
I fear everything good Strangecrow here says
always means both 'yes' and 'no.' My advice is
to just interpret his answers however you like.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.text: Oh dear. I'm rubbish at riddles.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Another giant robot! I wonder if
Pandora is inside it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, it's but a den of fiends inside!
You're better off staying here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Yeah, probably no point to it.
Also, hey, Sorrowcrow. Been a while.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
There are fiends in this world, then.
Did they also emerge from Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Woe, but those things have always been here!
Honestly, I've no idea if they're older
than Pandora or not.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: Are the scarecrows older than Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: Well, let's have a peek inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
We'll have to see if we can
find Pandora somewhere else.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, what misery! However, I can
at least change the flow of sand now
that those horrid fiends are gone.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: I'll count on ye for that, love.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
I wonder if this robot can change
the flow of the sand?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Still, wouldn't it make sense to establish such
things near to the dunes themselves? Why are
they so far away? Also, how are they even able
to manipulate the dunes to begin with?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Are they capable of doing anything
besides changing the direction
of the sands, then?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Why is there always a scarecrow
next to each of them?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
I wonder if this robot can change
the flow of the sand?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Spookcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
I CAN DO ANYTHING, BUDDY!
I'M A FREAKIN' SCARECROW!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Hello, Spookcrow. Think you could
turn the volume down to a dull roar?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
If that's true, can ye tell me
about my missing heart?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Hearts are scarecrows!
That means your heart is me!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text: Nae, I don't believe that's true.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Are you people nuts? What are you doing
here? The robots will tear you to shreds
if they find you! Okay, let's back up. I'm the Engineer,
and I'm looking for a way to turn
the tide of this war in our favor.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm D05-72314, also known as Songstress
Diva No. 5. I'm looking for my heart,
as well as Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, war robots continue to be produced
in this place, so if Pandora is real,
this makes as much sense as anywhere.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Speaking of which, we've got
a war robot incoming!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Is this really Pandora? All of our data
indicated it would put up more of a fight.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Yes, it did seem a bit weak for an eternal
war machine. Maybe the real Pandora is 
somewhere else. Shall we go have a look?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
This is what remains of a battleship.
Could it be Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Could be Pandora, yep!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: This is Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: You know about this place, then?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: I am the Wiseman. I know all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Then where can I find my heart?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: That I do not know.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Shame, that. Still, if this is Pandora,
it's possible I might find my heart here,
so let's look about inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Let's look inside!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: The inside is totally destroyed.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Totally.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: And yet, I hear a sound.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I dinnae think you would come with us.
Are you here to help search for my heart?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I do not know what lies inside.
Therefore, I must learn.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Do ye have any other information on
Pandora ye might share with us?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Pandora is sand. Pandora creates the sand.
It buries this world in mountains of sand,
causing it to suffocate.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
So all we need to do is stop the sand
production lines? Aye, that's a thing
I can certainly do. Still, I wonder if closing Pandora
will really lead to finding my heart.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: That I do not know.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Let's see if we can find the
production lines, then.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Searching time!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
The sand is fiends.
The fiends are sand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Ach! That's no ordinary sand!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Pandora controls the sand. Every grain is
a perfect miniature recreation of Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
So my sensor issues DO have an external cause!
If Pandora is capable of controlling individual
grains of sand, it explains how it was possible
to change the flow of the sands outside. So if we stop Pandora from giving orders
to the sand, we can stop all of this.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Sounds like you found Pandora.
So what happens now?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
We discovered Pandora's identity.
Now we need to find a way to stop it
from relaying orders.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Why not try this thing?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I went ahead and fixed it up earlier.
I think it's some kind of search mech?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh, brilliant! It's a tool to help fight
Pandora! Let's try to track it down, then.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: And we're off.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: The time to battle Pandora has come.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text:
The sand has stopped.
Pandora has been sealed.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: Can't believe you managed to find Pandora and close it... Who are you, anyway?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: Just some weirdo looking for a heart— but it takes all kinds to save the world. Speaking of which, it's time for you to get back and save your own world, yes?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text:
Is it truly so odd to seek a heart?
Also, what even is a heart?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text:
When you find your heart, you'll find
that answer along with it. But for now,
it's time to leave the Crowrealm.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: I want to save worlds too!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
This is the wreckage of a submarine,
which posits this area used to be a sea.
I wonder how it came to be desert instead?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Perhaps this scarecrow is here to watch over it?
Still, I thought they were only made in fields,
so the fact they exist elsewhere is fascinating.
Perhaps whoever put it here lives nearby.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I'd no idea scarecrows could talk!
Another brilliant new discovery!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Wonderful to meet you as well! I'm Scarecrow,
and I've been standing here for three thousand
days waiting for someone like you to come by.
Oh, but this is a glorious moment!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I apologize for keeping ye waiting.
My serial number is D05-72314, but I'm
more commonly known as Songstress
Diva No. 5. Also, I'm looking for my heart.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Well, I'm a real talker, so I'm happy you're
here! Where did you come from? The airship?
The battleship? The cruise ship?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I came from anther world, and as such
lack information about this place.
Might ye guide me around, love?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, I'd be delighted! I'm bored to
tears with all this standing around.
Now let's go find that heart!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
And there you are!
One cruise ship, just as promised.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Aye, but how do we get there?
The sand is just going to push us back.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Oh, right! In that case,
I know where we should go.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
This looks to be a war mech, though it's
currently not in a combat-ready state.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Hello, Strangecrow! I'd like you to change
the flow of the sand, if you would.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.text: Can ye change the flow of the sands?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
I fear everything good Strangecrow here says
always means both 'yes' and 'no.' My advice is
to just interpret his answers however you like.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Then I'll assume he can change
the flow and hope for the best.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_01.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_01.text: We should be able to proceed now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
This must be the cruise ship. Judging by
the advanced state of decay, it's quite old.
Will I truly find my heart here?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I don't know about your heart,
but you'll find lots of people!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
This does seem a suitably sized place
for loads of people to live.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Nae, I've no wire. I'm D05-72314, also known
as Songstress Diva No. 5, and I'm looking for my
heart. Ye wouldn't happen to know where I might
find it, would ye?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
You're not a junkman? Bah. Also, I'm an
engineer, so I've no interest in emotional
foofaraw like 'hearts.'

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Not the response I was hoping for.
I don't even know where to look now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Maybe start by trying to find Pandora!
If this heart you're looking for exists,
it'll be in a special place like that.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
As in the place from which countless
calamities were once unleashed?
I though that story was rubbish.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
In this world, Pandora is real. It is Pandora
that plunged this place into war and ruin,
and the horror of that continues to this day. So if we hope to free ourselves from all of
this someday, we must find a way to survive
and close Pandora once and for all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
If Pandora is where I'll find my heart,
I need to go there right away.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I only know I need to go there.
So how can I find it, then?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I have no idea where Pandora is.
I suggest you ask a scarecrow.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Do ye know where to find
Pandora, Scarecrow?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Of course! You simply go this way,
then that way, then some way!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
It's another giant mech.
Is this Pandora, then?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text: Can ye tell us anything, then?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
I wonder if this mech can change
the flow of the sand?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Spookcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
I CAN DO ANYTHING, BUDDY!
I'M A FREAKIN' SCARECROW!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Hello, Spookcrow. Think you could
turn the volume down to a dull roar?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
If that's true, can ye tell me
about my missing heart?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
It's another giant mech.
Could Pandora be inside it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, it's but a den of fiends inside!
You're better off staying here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Yeah, probably no point to it.
Also, hey, Sorrowcrow. Been a while.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
There are fiends in this world, then.
Did they also emerge from Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Woe, but those things have always been here!
Honestly, I've no idea if they're older
than Pandora or not.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: Are the scarecrows older than Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: Well, let's have a peek inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
We'll have to try and find
Pandora somewhere else.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Despair! Now that the fiends are gone,
I have been given a heart.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: I wonder when I'll find my own heart.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
I wonder if this mech can change
the flow of the sand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Sand? Awww, that's easy! ♥
Also, heya, baby! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: Hello, Sweetcrow. Nice to see you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
You just ask for whatever you want, boo. ♥
There's nothing a scarecrow can't do! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Oh, that's brilliant! Can you tell me
where to find my missing heart!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Sure thing, sweet cheeks! ♥ Just ask
yourself this: what's the most special-est
place in the entire Crowrealm, hmm? ♥
Here's a hint: it's not some dumb robot! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
This is what remains of a battleship. 
I wonder if it's Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: You knew about this place, guy?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: I am the Wiseman. I know all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Its combat abilities were significantly
less than my predictions. The odds this
was Pandora are only 20 percent.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Did I not just tell you
this is not Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Do ye know where we might
find Pandora, then?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Well, there are still places we haven't
looked. I suppose we'll try those.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
And just what do you plan to do
once you actually find Pandora!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
This is the only place where we haven't
looked yet. There is a 95 percent chance
that Pandora is here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I say, who are you!?
Did you come from the outside!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I'm D05-72314, otherwise known as
Songstress Diva No. 5. I'm looking for
my heart, as well as Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
So the legends are true—an outsider will
open Pandora, and an outsider will close it!
Is this prophecy? An accurate prediction?
A cleverly executed program? Whatever it may be, one thing is certain:
history will now begin to move.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Yes, well, introductions! I'm the Professor,
and I'm researching the Crowrealm's history.
I've spent hour after endless hour in this place,
but today, you will put an end to that!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Are ye suggesting I've been programmed to
close Pandora? There's no evidence of that
in my memory banks, and I'm honestly not
sure I'd be up to the task.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I don't know either, for no one's ever seen
Pandora. And even if I knew for sure it was
deep inside this place, I couldn't reach it.
...But YOU could!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Aye, I understand. I'll go inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Let's go check!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
It wasn't easy, but we managed to breach
its defenses. I wonder if I'll really find my
heart in this place?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Pandora's secrets are deeper within,
so we need to keep moving. Oh, but I
can't wait to finally witness history!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Deeper within!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Moving sand... So this is the truth of Pandora? It's just digging up sand from somewhere and scattering it all across our world? Absurd! Ridiculous! Complete and utter rot! I can't believe we let all time come to a standstill because we were afraid of this!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: This isn't sand—it's robots!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Aye, it's as the scarecrow says:
this is a robot production line.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: I fear I don't understand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
We are currently surrounded by countless
sand robots—and that's a proper problem!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Real proper!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: We made it!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
We managed to make it out—but if
we cannae stop those sand robots,
then we cannae close Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
You can do it! That's why the legend
says you will be the one to close Pandora!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Try as I might, I cannae find any such
capabilities within myself. I fear this
task is impossible for me after all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: So impossible!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
You will need power equal to Pandora's
own if you wish to fight it and win.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Do ye know something
that might help?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Use this. It hates Pandora, and may prove
a great aid in your upcoming fight.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Hate begets nothing!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I've never heard of a mech that can
hate before. Are ye able to do that
because ye have a heart, wee bot?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Sarab
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Sarab will kill Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Scarecrow too!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.text:
The time has come at last... Oh, to think
I might witness a turning point in history
with my own eyes.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.text:
Can you believe it!? I was actually
able to experience the moment a
legend became reality!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.text:
You did it! You actually closed Pandora!
Ha ha haaa... Hey, wait. What the heck are
we supposed to do with the rest of our lives?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.text:
Not at all, my dear. You did what was
required in order to find your heart.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.text: But how am I supposed to live?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
This is what remains of a cruise liner.
Judging by the decay, it is quite old.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, and there's a scarecrow here!
Maybe someone left it behind?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
The ship was left behind by people,
but I sure wasn't!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Jinks, I didn't know there were scarecrows
who could speak! Well, I am D05-72314,
otherwise known as Songstress Diva No. 5.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: And I am! Scarecrow, actually! I had no idea I was famous enough for complete strangers to know my name!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm looking for my heart. Do ye
maybe know where I might find it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Nope! We should ask someone else!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
And there you are!
One battleship, just as promised.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Aye, but how do we get there?
The sand is just going to push us back.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Oh, right! In that case,
I know where we should go.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Oh my days, it's a massive mech!
Seems to be switched on, but it's
not moving or otherwise doing
anything. I wonder why that is.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Hello, Smilecrow. I'd like you to change
the flow of the sand, if you would.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Aha ha ha ha ha! Scarecrow?
Aha ha ha ha ha! The flow of sand?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text: Can ye change the flow of the sand?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text: The flow of sand! Aha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text: We should be able to proceed now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
This is the wreckage of a battleship.
I wonder if my heart is inside?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I don't know about your heart,
but there are people in here!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
This ship was clearly once used for combat,
but has now been repurposed as a living space.
That's quite brilliant, actually.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
The arrival of souls from the
outside world is an omen.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
How did ye know I came
from the outside world?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: I am the Wiseman. I know all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Really!? Then please tell me
where I can find my heart!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I'm trying to figure
that out, actually.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Let me proclaim your fate to you, outsider:
You will find Pandora inside the submarine.
What happens after that—and on the way—
is all up to you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Aye, but I lack data on this world.
Do ye happen know where we might
find the submarine, Scarecrow?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
What is Pandora, though? I've no records
of such a thing in my database.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text: I wonder if my heart is here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Hello, Spookcrow. Think you could
turn the volume down to a dull roar?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text: Do ye know where my heart might be?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
It's another giant mech.
I wonder if my heart is inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, it's but a den of fiends inside!
You're better off staying here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Yeah, probably no point to it.
Also, hey, Sorrowcrow. Been a while.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
There are fiends in this world, then.
Did they also emerge from Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Woe, but those things have always been here!
Honestly, I've no idea if they're older
than Pandora or not.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: Are the scarecrows older than Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: Well, let's have a peek inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
We'll have to see if we can find
Pandora somewhere else.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, what misery! However, I can
at least change the flow of sand now
that those horrid fiends are gone.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: I'll count on ye for that, love.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: I wonder if my heart is here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: Hello, Sweetcrow. Nice to see you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
What's the most special-est place in the
entire Crowrealm, hmm? ♥ Here's a hint:
it's not some dumb robot! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
This looks to be a combat mech.
I wonder if my heart is here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
I fear everything good Strangecrow here says
always means both 'yes' and 'no.' My advice is
to just interpret his answers however you like.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
I should have known finding my heart
wouldn't be so simple as all that.
I'm sorry if I caused any trouble.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
These are the remains of an airship.
This world must have been home to an
advanced civilization at some point.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I say, who are you!?
Did you come from the outside!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I came from another world
in search of my heart.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
So you're not here to close Pandora? Blast!
Well, I am the Professor, a researcher of
the Crowrealm's history who is also seeking
a way to seal Pandora for good.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
And what exactly is Pandora?
The Wiseman told me I would
find it in the submarine.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
The Wiseman said that? Then you must
go to the submarine at once, my dear!
This place holds nothing for you!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: But we have an enemy incoming...

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Now go! Find the Junkman in the submarine,
and get his help to close Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I'd like to do as ye ask,
but I still have too little
information about Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I wonder if my heart will really
be there. I suppose all I can do
is go to the submarine and see.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
This is the wreckage of a submarine, which
means this area must have been a sea once.
I wonder if Pandora is really here—or my
heart, for that matter.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Ah! An outsider has arrived, just as the
Wiseman foretold. He also claimed that the
closing of Pandora was all in your hands.
So then...will you close it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Is this Pandora connected
to my heart in some way?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Pandora is the cause of all desolation in
this world. It brought calamity to the land
and launched a war that rages to this day. And if we hope to right these most
terrible wrongs, we must close Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
That doesn't sound like something
I'm capable of doing, actually.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
No, I wouldn't think so—yet I'm sure you'll
pull it off anyway. Because if you don't,
your heart will forever be out of reach.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I wonder if that's really true.
Still, I suppose I'll just do what
I must to find my heart.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
The fact there are security mechs here suggests
there's something worth protecting, but I'm not
seeing anything.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Not as of yet, but the path goes on.
Now come. I know we will find it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Nae, all I'm seeing is sand.
Is Pandora really here?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: The sand... Of course! The sand is the cause of all this! The sand is Pandora! It was created here in this place, and once it spread across the Crowrealm, it sent the entire world to ruin.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: The sand is Pandora? I'm confused.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Sand's coming. Oh, and it's taken the
form of a fiend, so look out for that!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
I cannae believe the sand really WAS Pandora!
But if Pandora is made up of every grain of
sand in this world, I'm powerless against it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text: You can do it. You will. The prophecy says as much.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
But how am I supposed to stop infinite
grains of sand, though? I cannae do it!
I don't have that kind of power!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
I hear you found Pandora!
Did you manage to close it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
Pandora is all the sand in this world.
It's impossible to 'close it.'

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
The sand is...? But no, that can't be!
The sand isn't attacking us!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
I presume that's because it
hasn't been ordered to.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
So if we stop whatever orders the sand
to attack, it will just be sand forever?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text: This is my lovely assistant. Surely together you can find a way to close Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text: You can do it. You will. The prophecy says as much.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text: Aye, I'll do what I can.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text:
The prophecy has been fulfilled,
and Pandora is closed at last.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text:
The Crowrealm has finally been returned to us,
and from this day forward, we shall restore it
to its former glory with our own hands!

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text:
In the end, I wasn't able to find a link
between Pandora and my heart—but I WAS
able to make everyone chuffed as chips,
so I think this was time well spent.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text:
Well then, that's all that matters!
Now let's quit this place.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text:
I'm going to stay here and help
with the restoration.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text: I'll be cheering for ye, love.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text:
Why not come along and help
search for my heart?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
So you are the one who will close
Pandora. Are you prepared?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
So you'll be my combat training instructor,
then? It's a pleasure to meet you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
I am the Wiseman,
and while I do know all,
I know nothing at all about combat.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Is that so? I'm starting to have
second thoughts about this.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_010_000.text: Where did these fiends come from?

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_010_010.text:
I am the Wiseman,
and while I do know all,
I know nothing at all about fiends.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_010_020.text:
That's all right, love.
Nobody's perfect.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_001_CUT_000_000.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_001_CUT_000_000.text:
I am the Wiseman, and I know all.
More fiends approach.

SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_002_CUT_000_000.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_002_CUT_000_000.text:
I am the Wiseman, and I know all.
These next fiends are the last.
